title: Who would win, Papyrus vs. Mugman? - Quora

response.answer_text: Mugman all the way. First of all Mugman is actually smart. Second of all Papyrus’s puzzles always break. 3rd of all, Mugman actually fought the devil. Mugman- see’s Papyrus the Skeleton. Looks at his wanted poster. Papyrus- Looks at Mugman. “It’s a human that looks like a mug!” Mugman- “It’s one of the monster the devil wants killed!” Papyrus- “I will hit u with my special attack!” misfires. Mugman- shoots at Papyrus and makes him sign the contract. Boom, the worst battle ever made! -Shikamaru Gang

Mugman would definitely have trouble he never goes anywhere without cuphead but since this is 1v1 pap has a advantage mugman is use to having his brother cover fire but he is not there same fo pap but pap is use to his brother not there i think pap would win because his attacks attack the soul directly
